mapper.insert: insert into member (ID, NAME, PW, EMAIL, EMAIL_CHECK, ADDRESS1, ADDRESS2, ADDRESS3, PHONE, SMS, TEL, BIRTH, CALENDER_CHECK, point, JOIN_DATE) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{pw}, #{email}, #{email_check}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{address3}, #{phone}, #{sms}, #{tel}, #{birth}, #{calender_check}, #{point}, sysdate)
mapper.update: update MEMBER set NAME = #{name}, ADDRESS1 = #{address1}, ADDRESS2=#{address2},ADDRESS3=#{address3},PHONE=#{phone},TEL=#{tel},PW=#{pw},EMAIL=#{email} where ID=#{id}
